page.title: 05Annual Events in Ripe
page.content: The Summer Flower Show. Summertime and the flowers are on display again. This time it is a far grander show on the local village cricket ground. Many tears have been shed by gardeners who cannot get their beens to grow straight and endless cakes have been cooked to get the perfect one. The committee erect a big Marquee in which the exhibits are staged. There are numerous stalls and side shows outside on the grass of the cricket pitch. The afternoon is fine and the tea ladies have to cover up the iced cakes to stop them melting. A good time is had by all... The Harvest Festival. The summer's produce is put on display in the church and thanks is given for another good year. A choral service is held in one of the two churches.
